title: 弓
name: Mouun's Moon
introduce: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.
skillContent: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12/0.15/0.18/0.21/0.24%. A maximum of 40/50/60/70/80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.
